ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual wielding question
ygData.msgSnippet: I wasn t saying you d have much of a chance to interupt, just saying that s the common reasoning behind wielding two different delays.  Personally, I ve been
ygData.messageBody:
I wasn't saying you'd have much of a chance to interupt, just saying that's
the common reasoning behind wielding two different delays. Personally, I've
been using pixie to interupt and have had outstanding success with it. ;-)

-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2000 8:39 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dual wielding question


Even by lvl 20 your chance of interuping a caster with a single hit is real
small (non PVP). MOnsters (rightly so, otherwise they would be WAY too
easy) have insane channeling skill.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
